articles.title: Malaysian actress' face smashed by 6kg bowling ball in wheelchair accident - AsiaOne
articles.description: Mishaps occasionally happen during filming and unfortunately, Malaysian actress Sheila Rusly's accident involved a 13-lbs (6kg) bowling ball. The 50-year-old plays a disabled bowler in a new drama series called Ratu Ten Pin and her character Mem Maria uses a …

articles.title: Ukraine crisis: Beauty queen Anastasia Lenna takes up arms in fight against Russian intruders - PerthNow
articles.description: She’s used to modelling the latest fashions on catwalks but a Ukrainian beauty queen has come to the call of her country in its hour of need and joined the fighting against Russian troops.

articles.title: 'I can't afford to get infected': Family of 6 on living with Covid-19 in a 2-room flat - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - After living in a two-room rental unit in Ang Mo Kio for 15 years, Mr Fedayin Ijan, 44, and his family of six were looking forward to moving to a four-room Housing Board flat next month. As they were steadily preparing for the move, his daughters …
